messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Phonics Phun
messages.msgSnippet: ... I had to laugh at this, Tuck, not because it s not a great idea to point out letters at these places.  Only because that s not what occurred to *me* at
messages.messageBody:
> But we did spend
> a lot of time in doctor's waiting rooms, or car dealerships or church or
> wherever, and capitalized on the fact that there's rarely much else to
> do in those places except read or point out letters.

I had to laugh at this, Tuck, not because it's not a great idea to point out
letters at these places. Only because that's not what occurred to *me* at
such places. My son used to associate going to the doctor with clapping
rhymes like Miss Mary Mack, Peas Porrige Hot, etc. because that's all *I*
could think of to do there. It kept his hands out of the doctor's stuff! :)

brenda
